page.topic: Printing the currently selected records, or opening a grid showing currently selected records
page.description: Putting a button on a grid to open another grid or a report is easily accomplished using Action Javascript. The video below shows how you can use the special Alpha Anywhere functions, CurrentGridFilter and CurrentGridOrder, to print the records that are currently selected in the grid. You can also use these functions to open another grid showing the same selection of records in the current grid.
